    Portfolio

    Bachelor Thesis:

    This thesis explores the different algorithmic possibilities to use for machine learning in an e-commerce environment. The goal in this thesis was to find the best case algorithm to solve the problem given by Rørkjøp AS. While also constructing an implementation for their system using the best case algorithm.

    An E-commerce site:

    www.OrientDesign.no - Oriental Marokkanske Kobber Lamper

    Running a website thats needs to get traffic to convert customers, pushes me to keep up with all the latest trends in the e-commerce, digital marketing and SEO space. Which i find balances well as a developer, since i like to test theories and fine tune my marketing and SEO to see if i can create growth.
